code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PurchaseOrderList=_ref=>{let{user}=_ref;const[orders,setOrders]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchOrders();},[]);const fetchOrders=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/api/purchase-orders');setOrders(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching orders:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"order-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Purchase Orders"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"order-grid",children:orders.map(order=>{var _order$rfpId,_order$vendorId,_order$buyerId;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"order-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["PO: ",order.poNumber]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"order-rfp",children:(_order$rfpId=order.rfpId)===null||_order$rfpId===void 0?void 0:_order$rfpId.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"order-amount",children:["Amount: $",order.totalAmount.toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"order-vendor",children:user.role==='buyer'?"Vendor: ".concat((_order$vendorId=order.vendorId)===null||_order$vendorId===void 0?void 0:_order$vendorId.name):"Buyer: ".concat((_order$buyerId=order.buyerId)===null||_order$buyerId===void 0?void 0:_order$buyerId.name)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"order-status",children:order.status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"order-date",children:["Created: ",new Date(order.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()]})]},order._id);})})]});};export default PurchaseOrderList;
